title: Cell biology: mitosis and DNA
brief_description: Describes the structure and duplication process of the DNA molecule. Uses microphotography and animation to show the division of a living cell. Illustrates the stages of the mitotic process and explains the meiotic process. Suitable for upper secondary level.
